Virus forgives Rancho and passes down his space pen as a mark of honor after he reveals that Mona successfully delivered a baby on a stormy night with the help of Farhan, Raju, and Virus's gardeners' son, Chhote, who took Rancho's place to get an education and earn a degree for him.

Farhan, Raju, and Chatur reach Shimla and find out that the real Rancho was a different man. Their friend was actually Chhote, the son of Rancho’s family's gardener.
Chatur mocks Rancho, thinking he is merely a teacher, but is shocked to realize that he is actually Phunsukh Wangdu, the person he is eager to make a business deal with.
